sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_betting_money_stat(DATE, INMONEY, OUTMONEY, POINT_BETTING) SELECT A.DATE, A.INMONEY, B.OUTMONEY, C.POINT_BETTING FROM (SELECT date_format(DATE, '%Y%m%d') as DATE, SUM(MONEY) as INMONEY FROM tbl_betting WHERE STATUS in ('BS001', 'BS002', 'BS003') AND END_DATE >= CURDATE()-1 AND DATE < CURDATE()+0 GROUP BY date_format(DATE, '%Y%m%d')) as A, (SELECT date_format(DATE, '%Y%m%d') as DATE, SUM(EXPECT) as OUTMONEY FROM tbl_betting WHERE STATUS in ('BS002') AND END_DATE >= CURDATE()-1 AND END_DATE < CURDATE()+0 GROUP BY date_format(DATE, '%Y%m%d')) as B, (SELECT date_format(DATE, '%Y%m%d') as DATE, SUM(MONEY) as POINT_BETTING FROM tbl_point WHERE TYPE = 'PNT02' AND DATE >= CURDATE()-1 AND DATE < CURDATE()+0 GROUP BY date_format(DATE, '%Y%m%d')) as C WHERE A.DATE = B.DATE AND A.DATE = C.DATE

INSERT INTO tbl_member_money_stat(DATE, BALANCE, MONEY) SELECT SYSDATE(), A.BALANCE, B.MONEY FROM (SELECT SUM(BALANCE) as BALANCE FROM tbl_member WHERE STATUS = 'US001') as A, (SELECT IFNULL(SUM(MONEY), 0) as MONEY FROM tbl_betting WHERE STATUS in ('BS001') AND DATE >= CURDATE()-1 AND DATE < CURDATE()+0) as B
